message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down to $16,500, but I can't go any lower. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16,000 for the product.
